meanings.definition: Of or relating to carbamic acid.
meanings.sent1: The carbamic solution was used in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on the carbamic properties of the compound.
meanings.sent3: The carbamic acid decided to throw a party for the other chemicals.
meanings.sent4: The carbamic nature of the substance made it stand out in the lab.
meanings.sent5: The students were amazed by the colorful display of the carbamic reaction.

meanings.definition: A salt or ester of carbamic acid.
meanings.sent1: The chemist synthesized a new carbamic for the reaction.
meanings.sent2: The market offers various carbamics for agricultural use.
meanings.sent3: The carbamic in the beaker seemed to be dancing under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a carbamic, leaving a lasting impression on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The chef added a pinch of carbamic to enhance the flavor of the dish.
